If you are planning to run a study and wish to use the using the WUPSY Network, then please contact [psychology.technician@wrexham.ac.uk](mailto:psychology.technician.wrexham.ac.uk).


# Home Students

Students can only publish on this site if they meet the credit requirements provided on the SONA page. Once you have completed the minimum credit requirements then you will be able to use this space to share your research on this domain.  



# Researchers 

For researchers who are part of Wrexham University Psychology Network can place their research titles here.
